original_text: And the Lord said to Moses and Aaron, “This is the statute of the Passover: no foreigner shall eat of it,
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세와 아론에게 이르시되 유월절 규례는 이러하니라 이방 사람은 먹지 못할 것이나

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Moses and Aaron,
This is the statute of the Passover:
no foreigner shall eat of it,
